item.title: New Site! Now a colorized cli/shell site!
item.description:
It came very closse to overcome the 2048 time waster, you blink once and one hour is gone.

Kris has done a video about ANSI colors and effects on the POSIX shell, some time ago. So i did a version of my site (only the index.html) in which you dont neew a web browser. Only write this command:

curl -L hekuran.ga/cli

Using ansi2html, i made a html version of it: https://hekuran.ga/cli.html

Now all i need to do is to figure it out how to do it in on single URL, that then will redirect you respectively. For example, the single URL https://wttr.in/berlin can be requested from a WebBrowser and a tool like curl. But in my case there is the file cli and cli.html.

item.title: New domain
item.description:
Since a few weeks a had the new domain, hekuran.ga, the old domains are still up of course, so the RSS will still work.

I got the domain name from Freenom, since they are for free, and even if it weren't i wanted that .ga. they have other tld.

I did strugle getting one though, it turned out if they dont "like" your ip, you wont get one. So i had to use a vpn to open an account, and only then i was able to get it.
